effect.Name: Multiplication With Floating Modulus (Background)
effect.description: Base and blend colors are multiplied after which the colors are reduced by the floating modulus function.
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Multiplication With Floating Modulus (Background) Shader | 1.2 (26.06.2024) */
parameter.description: Base and blend colors are multiplied after which the colors are reduced by the floating modulus function.

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable is responsible for the visibility of the effect.

parameter.name: Denom
parameter.description: This variable represents the denominator used in the floating-point modulus operation, determining the divisor in the function.
